phrs.translation: 生物医学工程学，生物医学工程
生物医学；生物医学科学；生物科学系

sentences.sentence: Biomedical research will enable many individuals infected with HIV to live longer, more comfortable lives.
sentences.translation: 生物医学研究将使许多感染艾滋病病毒的人们能够活得时间更长、更舒适。

sentences.sentence: In the competitive game of biomedical science, research has been done on scientists who narrowly lost or won grant money.
sentences.translation: 在生物医学科学的竞争中，一些以微弱劣差距掉或赢得了资助的科学家完成了研究。

sentences.sentence: To biomedical researchers all over the world, twins offer a precious opportunity to untangle the influence of genes and the environment—of nature and nurture.
sentences.translation: 对世界各地的生物医学研究人员来说，双胞胎提供了一个宝贵的机会，来解开基因和环境——也就是先天和后天的影响之谜。
